markdownRemark.html: A full time college offering training in Acting, Singing and dance (ballet, jazz, tap, commercial). Their course is designed to offer anyone the tools they need to become a ‘triple threat’ performer able to audition for major London and International (Degree Level) Dance and Drama Schools and go on to have a career in Musical Theatre and its related industries. The course is 35 hours per week and for two years.

frontmatter.title: Marbella Performance College

frontmatter.address: Escuela de Danza, Calle Pirita Nr.10, Poligono Industrial, La Ermita, 29601, Marbella
